glsa.title: X2Go Server: Privilege Escalation
glsa.synopsis: A local privilege escalation vulnerability has been discovered in X2Go Server.

background.p: X2Go is an open source terminal server project.

description.p: X2Go Server is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All X2Go Server users should upgrade to the latest version:
